entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Churchill Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:41 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -28.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Churchill Falls 09:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -28.8°C
Pressure: 103.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 75 %
Dewpoint: -31.8°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning early in the morning. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022
